channel.title: DRUNK N' THROWED RADIO
channel.description: The Throwedest Real talk Show from hood boys on world view, politics, sports, and More! This is the type of SHOW Everyone's been waiting for...

image.title: DRUNK N' THROWED RADIO SHOW HOSTS
image.description: RA'KOO AND LIL PHILL HOSTS OF DRUNK N' THROWED

item.title: “Emotions in relationships… what make u think u can break the LAW?, … Society vs. Being Yourself how much does society effect the REAL YOU?, AND DOPEBOYZ… How long do you really think you have,… seriously? “
item.description:
Special Guest’s… The Boyz 4rom da Hood, D.D.C’s Truk Turna is Co- Piloting this episode, filling in for Lil Pheezee fa Reeezzeeeyy…. (the boy’s a workin’ man now J ) and Mama So So (3rd Alarm and Mama So-So’s Kitchen) and the 1st Lady of RKN Felicia aka Latina sits in with us as well.

New Music from: Lil Phill (RKN), Dawg Wonder (D.D.C.), Riq da Briq (GROUND OPENING), Steve Austin (Bioniq Labs/Universal), HeadKrack (Boondox), Wap 1 (GameHead), Mista Long (Dallas S.W.A.T.)… AND MORE!!
